summary: The document provides guidelines for the establishment of monetary cover and outlines the submission requirements for specific forms related to financial responsibilities. It details the necessity of submitting Form 3322 for quarters affecting a cover within the range B 240-250 and Form 1323 for harem cover responsibility within the same specified range.
key_findings: Procedures for monetary cover establishment are detailed.
Form 3322 is specified for quarters affecting a cover within the range B 240-250.
Form 1323 is required for harem cover responsibility within the same range.
Both forms are applicable within the B 240-250 range.
